### Update dependencies

Automatically created PR.

For more information see the ["CI - Update 'pre-commit' hooks" workflow](https://github.com/EMMC-ASBL/oteapi-plugin-template/blob/master/.github/workflows/ci_update_pre-commit.yml).

#### To-do

- [ ] Check that the diff is sensible, and that tests and builds pass with the new dependency versions.
- [ ] Make sure that the PR is **squash** merged, with a sensible commit message.
